arts.ttl: Ligue 1 Predictions | Round 12: Lyon host struggling PSG, Strasbourg host Lille
arts.sum: Ligue 1 Predictions, Round 12 GFFN editor-in-chief Luke Entwistle, and sub-editors Raphaël Jucobin and Bastien Cheval face off in our Ligue 1 predictions competition. This season, GFFN will also be hosting guests. Earlier this season, The Athletic’s Alex Barker participated and became…
